Directions: In a large saucepan, cook sausage, beef, onion, green pepper and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 pound uncooked hot Italian turkey sausage links, sliced
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chilies, undrained
1/3 cup minced fresh cilantro or parsley
